mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT examplaninfo.paperId,paperinfo.paperName FROM examplaninfo,paperinfo WHERE examplaninfo.examState=2 AND paperinfo.paperId=examplaninfo.paperId
SELECT DISTINCT classinfo.classId FROM scoreinfo,studentinfo,classinfo WHERE scoreinfo.paperId=#{id} AND scoreinfo.studentId=studentinfo.studentId AND classinfo.classId=studentinfo.classId

SELECT scoreinfo.scoreId,scoreinfo.paperId,scoreinfo.sumSco,classinfo.className FROM scoreinfo,studentinfo,classinfo WHERE studentinfo.studentId=scoreinfo.studentId AND scoreinfo.studentId=studentinfo.studentId AND classinfo.classId=studentinfo.classId AND scoreinfo.paperId=#{id} AND studentinfo.classId=#{classId}
